channel.title: Thieving time
channel.description: Hey. How do i change the thieving time? Like after you thief you have to wait like 20sec before you can thief again, how to i change it to like 2 sec instead?

item.title: Thieving time

item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Please use code tags.

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving time
item.dc:creator: @redweakling redweakling
item.description:
@redweakling wrote:

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); }
search actionInterval = in your client.java
and tell me the number after it

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving time
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 3m", 60, 500 * playerLevel[17], 995, 3000000, 30, 0x340);

“gem stall” = first message
" and recieve 3m" = second message
60 = I don’t know
500 * playerLevel[17] = give them 500 x their thieving level
995 = the item to give
3000000 = the amount
30 = i dont know.
0 x 340 = The emote.

Post your “ThiefStall” method.

Read full topic
